data.text:
The Hotel is Amazing, the Silk Spa took real good care of me with their signature, spa experiences, and Jacuzzi a shout-out to Alice for hooking me up with an amazing session.

The food experiences are amazing and the amenities in room were mind blowing.
data.title: Silk Spa

data.text:
I went to Habtoor Palace for afternoon tea with my husband. We were served by Yunita and Aditi - very hospitable, welcoming and great service. Would definitely recommend it.
Also the tea, pastry and sandwich selection was delicious!!!!!!
data.title: Afternoon tea

data.text: The service at this wonderful hotel is amazing, specially the restaurant staff are great, they made our stay very enjoyable. Ashif, Nkosi, Deb, Lucia and Jyoti - thank you so much for your amazing hospitality. I would definitely recommend this hotel for anyone visiting Dubai !
data.title: Amazing Service

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Amit,

Greetings from Habtoor Palace Dubai!

We are truly grateful for your kind words following your recent stay at our hotel. Your praise of our exceptional service, particularly highlighting the dedication of our restaurant team, warms our hearts and motivates us to continue delivering memorable experiences.

Ashif, Nkosi, Deb, Lucia, and Jyoti are thrilled to have made your stay truly enjoyable with their exceptional hospitality. Your recognition of their efforts means the world to us, and we will be sure to pass on your gratitude to them.

It is an honor to receive your recommendation, and we are delighted to have been a part of your Dubai experience. Should your travels bring you back to this vibrant city, we would be overjoyed to welcome you once again to our hotel.

Thank you for choosing us and for taking the time to share your feedback. Your satisfaction is our greatest reward.

Dedicated to Excellence,

Stefan Radstrom
General Manager
owner_response.author: Stefan Radstrom

data.text: We ate in the French BQ Restaurant (A La carte) in Habtoor Palace and I‘m soo grateful for this unforgettable dinner. The restaurant itself looks like a little museum; everything is super clean and the atmosphere is so calm that you directly feel comfortable. The service is top! We had the pleasure to meet Neel and Ashif and both are extremely polite and caring. They help you with everything you need! You really feel welcomed. The dishes were soooo delicious! Better than I expected and my expectations were high! Thank you especially to Chef Sanjay and Chef Sumit for this dreamy dishes! 10/10 would DEFINITELY recommend.
data.title: Like a dream

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Selma,

Greetings from Habtoor Palace Dubai! 

Thank you for sharing your wonderful dining experience at the BQ French Kitchen and Bar. We are thrilled to hear that your visit was like a dream come true.

It brings us immense joy to know that you found the restaurant's ambiance to be elegant and creating a comfortable atmosphere for you to enjoy your sumptuous dinner. We are delighted that Neel and Ashif provided top-notch service and made you feel welcomed and cared for throughout your dining experience.

We will make sure to pass along your kind words to Chef Sanjay and Chef Sumit for creating such delicious dishes that exceeded your expectations. Your recommendation means a lot to us, and we are grateful for your high praise.

We look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back for another exceptional dining experience at the Habtoor Palace Dubai! 

Dedicated to Excellence,

Stefan Radstrom
General Manager
owner_response.author: Stefan Radstrom

data.text:
Excellent hotel: staff, room, breakfast, location, services etc. 
Special thanks to the housekeepers Amal and Sahadat - quick, clean and beautiful  composition in the bad room 

Amazing meat restaurant- World Cut! The best in our experience! 
Special thanks to Arvin and Kasun for the great service in the restaurant

And last but not the least - thank you for the hotel for the upgrade as a gift for the Birthday
data.title: One week vacation for a couple

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Надежда С,

Greetings from Habtoor Palace Dubai.

Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at our hotel.

We are delighted to hear that your stay was nothing short of extraordinary. Your kind words about our team members, the suite, breakfast experience, and exceptional service mean a lot to us as we strive to provide a luxurious experience for all our guests.

We are grateful for your special mention of our housekeepers, Amal and Sahadat. It is wonderful to know that their efforts enhanced your stay.

We are thrilled that you enjoyed the dining experience at our amazing World Cut Steakhouse and that you found it to be the best in your experience. Special thanks to Arvin and Kasun for providing you with great service during your visit.

Lastly, we are delighted that we could contribute to your birthday celebrations by offering you an upgrade as a gift. We are pleased to have been a part of your special occasion.

Thank you for choosing Habtoor Palace, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable stay in the future.

Dedicated to Excellence,

Stefan Radstrom
General Manager
owner_response.author: Stefan Radstrom
